Package evs.data

Classes for I/O on forecasts, observations and verification pairs.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CheckSyntheticScatter Convenience class for rapidly viewing synthetically generated pairs.
Condition An abstract base class for specifying conditions to restrict a verification study.
ConditionArray Convenience class for collating an array of Condition objects and allowing them to be applied sequentially to the input data.
DataSource A simple wrapper class for a data location, such as a file data location.
DateCondition A class for specifying date restrictions on a verification unit.
DateElement Class for representing a date element, comprising one of: Calendar.YEAR Calendar.MONTH Calendar.WEEK_OF_YEAR Calendar.DAY_OF_WEEK Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY The date element may be specified in valid time or forecast basis time (issue time).
FileArrayDataSource Constructs a file array data source with an array of files.
FileDataSource Constructs a file data source with a single file.
ForecastTime Base class for representing valid time or issue time and, optionally, lead time.
IOState A class used to identify the I/O state of an object being read or written.
LeadTimeCondition A class for specifying lead time restrictions on a verification unit.
PairedData Records a set of paired forecasts and observations.
PairedDataSource Constructs a file data source for paired data.
SimpleDateCondition A class for specifying a simple date condition comprising a start and end date within which the data must fall.
SyntheticPairs A class for generating synthetic paired data for testing purposes.
ValueCondition A class for specifying restrictions on variable values to include in the verification.
VUIdentifier Class for indexing data by Verification Unit, which stores a unique combination of location ID and variable ID.
 

Exception Summary
ConditioningException Class for throwing exceptions that signifies a problem performing conditioning.
InvalidUnitException Class for throwing exceptions that signify an invalid unit.
PairedDataException Class for throwing exceptions that signify an invalid unit.
 

Package evs.data Description

Classes for I/O on forecasts, observations and verification pairs.
